text: Kawasola ng'ombe wabili kawakanha kanha vihande vihande, kawagwaa waja iwasenga wakavike mna imbaka ya Izilaeli kuno walonge munhu yoyose hailumba na Sauli na Samweli kuna ing'hondo ng'ombe zake otendigwa kamba vino. Waizilaeli wadumba kija chayalondile kutenda Mndewa Imulungu, avo wose wailumba na hewo.
